page.title: 13IMPORTANT EVENTS IN LEVEN
page.content: {School Spring Fair Every year our school holds a spring fair in May.We bring all the things such as; plants,toys,books,tombola,prize draw and bottle stall.The 4th year children organise all the games.The money is used for school equipment we would not otherwise be able to afford.Everyone has lots of fun. {Leven Gala In July,the village holds a gala day. Different steets,clubs and organisations or indivduals decorate lorries or tractors and trailers or people dress up.The floats are judged at the Close by a celebrity and then they process around the village with the band and Leven Majorettes.
